HomeAbout

You and Rah agree to stay indoors. Who knows what is going on out there, but figuring out this radio thing is your main priority right now. You sit in Rah's room as they continually fiddle with the machine.

BANG! The sound of a firework cracks over town. What is going on? Very rarely are there ever fireworks in Chegckle.

"What is going on?" Rah jumps.

Has there ever been a weirder night in Chegckle? Hopefully it's just a bunch of inmature kids, who got ahold of some fireworks. Then Rah lets out a yawn, and so do you. A wave of exhaustion comes over you, and you suddenly feel very drowsy.
